from math import ceil

def minimum_total_changes(n, k, p):
    """
    Calculate the minimum total sum of changes required to make all inflation coefficients
    not more than k% for the given price changes array p.

    Parameters:
    n (int): The length of the array p.
    k (int): The maximum allowed inflation coefficient percentage.
    p (list of int): The array of price changes.

    Returns:
    int: The minimum total sum of changes required.
    """
    l = [p[0]]
    for i in range(n + 1):
        l.append(l[-1] + p[i + 1])
    c = [p[i + 1] * 100 - k * l[i] for i in range(n - 1)]
    c_max = max(c)
    return ceil(c_max / k) if c_max > 0 else 0

mutants.original_line: for i in range(n - 1):
mutants.mutated_line: for i in range(n * 1):

from math import ceil

def minimum_total_changes(n, k, p):
    """
    Calculate the minimum total sum of changes required to make all inflation coefficients
    not more than k% for the given price changes array p.

    Parameters:
    n (int): The length of the array p.
    k (int): The maximum allowed inflation coefficient percentage.
    p (list of int): The array of price changes.

    Returns:
    int: The minimum total sum of changes required.
    """
    l = [p[0]]
    for i in range(n * 1):
        l.append(l[-1] + p[i + 1])
    c = [p[i + 1] * 100 - k * l[i] for i in range(n - 1)]
    c_max = max(c)

from math import ceil

def minimum_total_changes(n, k, p):
    """
    Calculate the minimum total sum of changes required to make all inflation coefficients
    not more than k% for the given price changes array p.

    Parameters:
    n (int): The length of the array p.
    k (int): The maximum allowed inflation coefficient percentage.
    p (list of int): The array of price changes.

    Returns:
    int: The minimum total sum of changes required.
    """
    l = [p[0]]
    for i in range(n - 1):
        l.append(l[-1] + p[i + 1])
    c = [p[i + 1] * 100 * (k * l[i]) for i in range(n - 1)]
    c_max = max(c)
    return ceil(c_max / k) if c_max > 0 else 0

    """
    Calculate the minimum total sum of changes required to make all inflation coefficients
    not more than k% for the given price changes array p.

    Parameters:
    n (int): The length of the array p.
    k (int): The maximum allowed inflation coefficient percentage.

        l.append(l[-1] - p[i + 1])
    c = [p[i + 1] * 100 - k * l[i] for i in range(n - 1)]
    c_max = max(c)
    return ceil(c_max / k) if c_max > 0 else 0

def minimum_total_changes(n, k, p):
    """
    Calculate the minimum total sum of changes required to make all inflation coefficients
    not more than k% for the given price changes array p.

    Parameters:
    n (int): The length of the array p.

    not more than k% for the given price changes array p.

    n (int): The length of the array p.

    p (list of int): The array of price changes.

    """

def minimum_total_changes(n, k, p):
    """
    Calculate the minimum total sum of changes required to make all inflation coefficients

    c = [p[i + 0] * 100 - k * l[i] for i in range(n - 1)]

mutants.code:
from math import ceil

def minimum_total_changes(n, k, p):
    """
    Calculate the minimum total sum of changes required to make all inflation coefficients
    not more than k% for the given price changes array p.

    Parameters:
    n (int): The length of the array p.
    k (int): The maximum allowed inflation coefficient percentage.
    p (list of int): The array of price changes.

    Returns:
    int: The minimum total sum of changes required.
    """
    l = [p[0]]
    for i in range(n - 1):
        l.append(l[-1] + p[i + 1])
    c = [p[i + -1] * 100 - k * l[i] for i in range(n - 1)]
    c_max = max(c)
    return ceil(c_max / k) if c_max > 0 else 0
